title: Shooting at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Men's double trap
text:
Men's <a href="double%20trap">double trap</a> shooting made its first appearance at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>, with <a href="Russell%20Mark">Russell Mark</a> becoming the inaugural champion after a strong final. <a href="Albano%20Pera">Albano Pera</a> and <a href="Zhang%20Bing%20%28sports%20shooter%29">Zhang Bing</a> won the other medals after a shoot-off with <a href="Park%20Chul-sung">Park Chul-sung</a>.
Qualification round.
OR Olympic record – Q Qualified for final
Final.
OR Olympic record
